<small>Also see: [[H5880]] | [[H8483]]</small>

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדֵשׁ‎</span> **proper name, of a location** (***sacred***; but perhaps originally <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶדֶשׁ‎</span> and pointing artificial to distinguish from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> in N); — 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangGreek">Καδης</span>: in south of Judah [[Gen.16.14|Gen 16:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.20.1|Gen 20:1]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִדְבַּר פָּארָן‎</span> [[Num.13.26|Num 13:26]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), specifically <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Num.20.1|Num 20:1]]; [[Num.33.36|Num 33:36]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדֵשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Ps.29.8|Ps 29:8]] on western border of Edom [[Num.20.16|Num 20:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.33.37|Num 33:37]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), compare [[Num.20.14|Num 20:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), v[[Num.20.22|Num 20:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Judg.11.16|Judg 11:16]]; [[Judg.11.17|Judg 11:17]] (hence [[BDB#Rob|Rob]]<sup>BR ii. 175, 194 sought it at</sup> ***\`Ain Weibeh***, in west of Arabah); long adobe of Israel during Exodus. [[Deut.1.46|Deut 1:46]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵי מְרִיבַת ק‎</span> [[Num.27.14|Num 27:14]] (compare <ref ref="Num 20:1-13" b="4" cBegin="20" vBegin="1" cEnd="20" vEnd="13" onclick="bcv(4,20,1)">Num 20:1-13</ref>), [[Deut.32.51|Deut 32:51]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ezek.47.19|Ezek 47:19]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרִיבַת‎</span>), [[Ezek.48.28|Ezek 48:28]], compare [[Deut.33.2|Deut 33:2]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹדֶשׁ‎</span> near the end); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין מִשְׁפָּט‎</span> [[Gen.14.7|Gen 14:7]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּרְנֵעַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> (meaning of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> unknown; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] Kings (<span class="bdbLangGreek">τοῦ</span>) <span class="bdbLangGreek">βαρνη</span>); — [[Num.32.8|Num 32:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Deut.1.2|Deut 1:2]]; [[Deut.1.19|Deut 1:19]]; [[Deut.2.14|Deut 2:14]]; [[Deut.9.23|Deut 9:23]]; [[Josh.10.41|Josh 10:41]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), [[Num.34.4|Num 34:4]]; [[Josh.15.3|Josh 15:3]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); — modern <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***±Ain †adîs***</u></abbr> (***kudais***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), approximately 50 miles south of Beersheba, J.Rowlands (1842) see GWilliams<sup>Holy City, 464 f.</sup>, and especially HCTrumbull (1881)<sup>Kadesh Barnea, 238-321</sup>. 

**2.** Hittite capital on the Orontes, north of Damascus, towards Hamath (Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***†dš, †dšu, †dše***</u></abbr> [[BDB#WMM|WMM]]<sup>As.u.Eur.213 ff.</sup>); — [[2Sam.24.6|2Sam 24:6]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] Löhr, reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ הַחִתִּים קָדֵ֫שָׁה‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתִּים חָדְשִׁי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַחִתִּים‎</span> already [[BDB#Hi|Hi]]<sup>Geschichte. Israel i. 29</sup>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדֵ֫שָׁה‎</span> [[BDB#The|Th]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶ֫דְשָׁה‎</span> [[BDB#Klo|Klo]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶדֶשׁ‎</span> in Naphtali); [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] doubts.
